name: cloudflare-typescript-workers
description: A tested Hello World Cloudflare Worker written in TypeScript

scripts.package-cloudflare-worker-mock: cd packages/@udacity/cloudflare-worker-mock;rm -rf node_modules/@udacity; mkdir -p node_modules/@udacity; cp -R ../types-cloudflare-worker node_modules/@udacity; cp -R ../types-service-worker-mock node_modules/@udacity; npm run prepublish
scripts.packages: npm run package-types-cloudflare-worker && npm run package-types-service-worker-mock; npm run package-cloudflare-worker-mock
scripts.build: webpack --progress --mode production # Create minified output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.build-dev: webpack --progress --mode none # Creates readable output, runs in Cloudflare
scripts.update-demo: cp src/* demo/src/; cp test/* demo/test/; # Demo updated on version releases
scripts.test-all: npm run packages && npm run lint && jest && npm run test-demo
